sentences.sContent: ...the sequence of events that left the eight pupils battling to survive in icy seas for over four hours.
sentences.sCn: …使4名小学生在冰冷的海洋中挣扎求生超过4个小时的一连串事件。

sentences.sContent: Those organisms that are most suited to the environment will be those that will survive.
sentences.sCn: 那些最适应环境的生物将是那些存活下来的。

sentences.sContent: Most women will survive their spouses.
sentences.sCn: 大多数女性比她们的配偶活得长。

remMethod.val: sur(上， 超)+viv(生命)+e→生命超过别人→比…长命

words.tran: 继续存在的；未死的；依然健在的
幸存，残存；幸存者，残存物
活命主义者；成功地活下来的人

trans.tranOther: If a person or living thing survives in a dangerous situation such as an accident or an illness, they do not die
